[ S ] the birth of Jesus Christ, celebrated by Christians at Christmas: Christmas is the season when Christians around the world recount the story of the Nativity.
[ C ] a model or picture of the Nativity: The nativity consisted of elaborate hand-carved figures. Nativity sets sell well in the run-up to Christmas.
[ C ] (also nativity play) a play that tells the story of Jesus Christ's birth, usually performed by children at Christmas: She played the role of Mary in the school nativity.
